param.name: wobble_size
param.toolTip: The spatial interval used by the pressure noise in pixels. Smaller values cause more jittery or blobby noise. Larger values look more inky.

param.name: wobble_strength_percent
param.toolTip: The maximum percent the pressure can be scaled down by. (pressure is scaled by: 100% - wobble_strength_percent)

param.name: second_layer_weight
param.toolTip: The weight applied to a second noise layer. If this is either 0 or 1, the wobble will look more regularly-spaced.

param.name: second_layer_scale
param.toolTip: The spatial scale of the second noise layer, relative to the first noise layer. If this is set very low, it will add a high-frequency noise. Rational numbers may cause a visible pattern.
